skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 13.4 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 12.6, Casting Spd. by 90%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Boost HP
skills.Description: Increases Max HP by 60.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting
skills.Description: Increases Casting Spd. by 5%.

skills.Name: Freezing Flame
skills.Description: Strikes the target with a magical cold flame dealing 52 Fire Magical Damage.

skills.Name: Venom
skills.Description: Poison the enemy, dealing 30 Magical Damage and dealing 36 damage per second for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Steal Essence
skills.Description: Summon dark energies around your target, ripping their life energies dealing 84 Magical Damage and absorbing 10% of the damage dealt.

skills.Name: Pa'agrio's Gift
skills.Description: Increases nearby clan members' P. Atk. by 8% for 20 minutes

skills.Name: Pa'agrio's Glory
skills.Description: Increases nearby clan members' M. Def. by 15% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Pa'agrio's Soul
skills.Description: For 60 minutes, increases nearby clan members' M. Atk. by 5% and M. Def. by 15%.

skills.Name: Chant of Healing
skills.Description: Chant to heal your wounds or your ally. Healing for 580Power.

skills.Name: Pa'agrio's Heart
skills.Description: Restores a clan member's HP with 240 Power and recovers 35 HP per second for 15 seconds. Restores CP if HP is full.

skills.Name: Dreaming Spirit
skills.Description: Causes the enemy to sleep for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Chant of Mana
skills.Description: Invoke a spell of mana, restoring 26 mana per second for 15 seconds.
